code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic [99:0] a,
    input logic [99:0] b,
    input logic sel,
    output logic [99:0] out
);

    always @(*) begin
        out = sel ? b : a;
    end

endmodule
```

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
